did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Board members: B. J. McKinney, R. E. Fishburn, and S. L. Kingan. Nature of business was buying and selling livestock and real estate in Arizona. Typescript articles of incorporation, minutes of meetings, by-laws, and expense account.

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.
